title: Username-based login success
description: Verify users can successfully authenticate using valid username and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username
Enter correct password
Click login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the appropriate dashboard

title: Login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click login button
Verify login failure notification is shown and no session is created

title: Google OAuth login success
description: Verify users can successfully authenticate using Google OAuth login method.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on Google OAuth login button
Complete Google OAuth authentication flow with valid Google account
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the appropriate dashboard

title: Role-based access control enforcement for ADMIN
description: Verify users with ADMIN role can access and perform actions on admin console pages and APIs.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN user
Navigate to admin console user management page
Create, update, and delete users and categories
Verify CRUD operations succeed with appropriate validation and persisted changes

title: Role-based access control denial for HELPER and STUDENT on admin pages
description: Verify users with HELPER or STUDENT roles cannot access admin-only pages or APIs.

steps.description: Login as HELPER user
Attempt to navigate to admin console pages
Verify access is denied or redirected to unauthorized page
Login as STUDENT user
Attempt to access admin APIs via direct requests
Verify API responses return permission denied errors

title: Public Resource Hub real-time search functionality
description: Verify that resource hub search updates results dynamically as the user types and filters results appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate to public Resource Hub page
Enter partial keywords into search input
Verify resource list updates in real-time to match search terms
Clear search input
Verify full resource list is displayed without filters

title: Club announcement RSVP and attendance tracking flow
description: Verify students can RSVP to club announcements, attendance progress bars update accordingly, and cannot RSVP multiple times.

steps.description: Login as STUDENT user
Navigate to Club Announcements page
Click RSVP button for a selected announcement
Verify RSVP confirmation and attendance progress bar increments
Attempt to RSVP again to the same announcement
Verify duplicate RSVPs are prevented and user is notified

title: AI Assistant chat rate limit handling
description: Verify the AI chat widget enforces rate limits and provides user-friendly notifications when limit is reached.

steps.description: Navigate to any public page with AI assistant
Send rapid consecutive chat requests exceeding rate limit
Verify rate limit error message is shown to the user
Wait until rate limit resets
Send chat request again
Verify chat response is returned successfully

title: IT Prefect dashboard profile update and password change
description: Verify IT Prefect users can update their profiles and change passwords with validation and session persistence.

steps.description: Login as IT Prefect user
Navigate to profile page in dashboard
Update profile fields such as display name and contact info
Change password providing current and new passwords
Verify updates are saved and user remains logged in
Logout and login again using new password
Verify login is successful with new password

title: Admin system-wide settings change with real-time application
description: Verify admin users can update system settings and changes reflect immediately across the site and persist after export/import.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN user
Navigate to system settings page in admin console
Change various site-wide settings (e.g. UI theme colors, feature toggles)
Verify changes immediately apply to the user interface
Export current configuration to a backup file
Import configuration from the exported backup file
Verify imported settings are correctly applied and persisted

title: Training Library categorized video view and tracking
description: Verify users can browse training library by categories, view videos, and views are tracked correctly.

steps.description: Login as IT Prefect or STUDENT user
Navigate to Training Library page
Filter videos by category
Play a training video
Verify video plays correctly and view count increments for the video

title: Event calendar syncing from activities
description: Verify events created or updated from the activities module sync properly to both internal and public calendars.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN user
Create or update an activity in activity news management
Trigger calendar sync from the admin calendar sync API
Verify new or updated events appear correctly on internal and public calendars

title: Media upload and video playback end-to-end
description: Verify that media uploads, including videos, are accepted, stored, and playable through the portal UI.

steps.description: Login as ADMIN or authorized user
Navigate to media upload page or component
Upload a supported video file
Verify upload completes successfully without errors
Navigate to the video playback component/page
Verify the uploaded video plays correctly with controls

title: Security - Rate limiting enforcement on public APIs
description: Verify that rate limiting is effectively applied to public APIs such as AI chat and announcements API, blocking excessive requests.

steps.description: Send rapid, repeated requests exceeding standard threshold to AI chat API
Verify rate limiting HTTP error response is returned
Send repeated requests exceeding threshold to announcements public API
Verify rate limiting error response is returned

title: Input sanitization prevents malicious input
description: Verify all user inputs in forms and APIs are sanitized to prevent injection, XSS, or other common attack vectors.

steps.description: Submit form inputs or API payloads containing script or SQL injection patterns
Verify input is sanitized, rejected, or safely handled without executing scripts or corrupting data

title: Error logging captures client, server, and edge errors
description: Verify that all types of errors occurring client-side and server-side are captured and logged with sufficient detail.

steps.description: Trigger client-side error by invalid operation on UI (e.g. accessing undefined component)
Trigger server-side API error by sending malformed request
Trigger edge error via middleware by unauthorized access attempt
Verify errors are logged with timestamps, stack traces, and user context in centralized logging

title: Responsive design across desktop, tablet, and mobile
description: Verify the portal UI layouts and components render properly and maintain usability on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the portal on desktop viewport size
Verify all UI components are arranged correctly and fully visible
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
Verify UI adapts fluidly with no overlapping or truncated text
Resize viewport to mobile dimensions
Verify navigation menus are accessible and content is readable without horizontal scrolling

title: UI animations and transitions performance
description: Verify UI animations and transitions execute smoothly without jank and provide appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate through the portal pages and interact with animated elements (dropdowns, modals, buttons)
Verify animations run smoothly and transitions provide clear visual feedback
